page.title: 07FARMING IN CO.ARMAGH IN 1985
page.content: The most familiar farms in Co.Armagh are{apple}farms. Most of the work is done by a tractor and a sprayer. In Spring the apple trees are sprayed with{Crab-Spray.}The Crab-Spray is sprayed on twice, killing crabs and other insects. As well as doing this it helps the buds to bud more apples. After this the farmer gets bees and sets them free in the orchard to pollinate the trees. Then he Sprays the apple trees with another kind of spray ten times.This takes place in late Spring or early Summer. If you want to you can enter a competition .If you have a good orchard you have got a good chance of winning. MR.McGRANE has won six times. {DARRYL MORGAN } {PAUL McGRANE
